com.jpmorrsn.fbp.components

Class ShowText

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.jpmorrsn.fbp.engine.Component
        • com.jpmorrsn.fbp.components.ShowText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ShowText
extends Component
    Component to write data to a Swing pane. The title comes in at another port. It is specified as "must run". Incoming packets are sent to output port.

        protected void execute()
        Description copied from class: Component

      • openPorts

        protected void openPorts()
        Description copied from class: Component
        Components override this method to open their ports. This method is called from the network's main thread, and should only call openInput, openInputArray, openOutput, openOutputArray, InputPort.setType, and OutputPort.setType.
        Specified by:
        openPorts in class Component
